parts.name: Photographs
parts.instructions: Choose the statement that best describes the picture.

context.imageDescription: Two cyclists are riding along a riverside path under a bridge.

questions.stem: What is true about the picture?
options: A. The cyclists are walking their bikes.
B. The cyclists are riding beside a river.
C. The cyclists are fixing a flat tire.
D. The cyclists are carrying umbrellas.
questions.explanationJa: 川沿いを走っている描写。Bが正解。

parts.name: Question-Response
parts.instructions: Listen to a question or statement and choose the best response.

context.audioTranscript: How much does the software license cost?

questions.explanationJa: “いくら”の質問に価格で回答するAが自然。

context.audioTranscript: Would you like me to book a taxi for you?

options: A. Yes, that would be great.
questions.explanationJa: 申し出に対する受諾。Aが適切。

parts.name: Conversations
parts.instructions: Listen to the conversation and choose the best answer.

conversation.speaker: M
conversation.text: The conference room is booked all morning.

conversation.speaker: W
conversation.text: Then let's meet after lunch at my office.

conversation.speaker: W
conversation.text: Do you know where the extra chairs are?

conversation.speaker: M
conversation.text: Check the storage room next to the kitchen.

context.question: Where are the chairs most likely located?

questions.explanationJa: “storage room next to the kitchen”と指示。Bが正解。

parts.name: Talks
parts.instructions: Listen to the talk and choose the best answer.

context.talk: Attention passengers: The 9:15 train to Kyoto will depart from platform 3 due to maintenance on platform 2.
context.question: Which platform will the train depart from?

parts.name: Incomplete Sentences
parts.instructions: Choose the word or phrase that best completes the sentence.

questions.stem: All new employees must 【_____】 in the orientation session.
The CEO will arrive 【_____】 the office at around 10 a.m.
questions.explanationJa: 到着先が特定の場所（office）なのでarrive at。

parts.name: Reading Comprehension
parts.instructions: Read the passage and choose the best answer.

context.passage: Notice: The cafeteria will serve a limited menu on Friday due to a staff shortage.

questions.stem: Why is the menu limited on Friday?
options: B. Because of a staff shortage.
D. Because of a private event.

context.passage: Text: Thank you for choosing Green Taxi. Your driver, Masa, will arrive in 3 minutes. License: 12-45.

questions.stem: Approximately when will the driver arrive?
questions.explanationJa: “will arrive in 3 minutes”と記載。Aが正解。

metadata.noteJa: 本データはTOEIC形式に準拠したオリジナルのミニ模試（10問）です。
